title: Acupuncture for pre and post Covid Vaccine and the treatment of Long Covid
author: Login
description: Watch a recording of Dominique Joire and Kath Berry in a webinar discussing how acupuncture can help support patients preparing for the covid vaccine, vaccination aftercare and to rapidly speed up the recovery rate from post-viral exposure or "long covid"

Acupuncture for pre and post Covid Vaccine and the treatment of Long Covid Watch a recording of Dominique Joire and Kath Berry in a webinar discussing how acupuncture can help support patients preparing for the covid vaccine, vaccination aftercare and to rapidly speed up the recovery rate from post-viral exposure or "long covid". Long Covid is a term to describe the effects of Covid-19 that continue for weeks or months beyond the initial illness. In TCM terms: Lingering Pathogenic Factors (LPF). This course is priced in GBP and has been converted to dollars using an exchange rate of 1.3. Please bear in mind this price could slightly vary depending on the current exchange rate.
